> You should update webpack-cli to the 4.3.0

`config/webpack/loaders/eslint.js`ã§eslint-loaderã‚’ä½¿ã†ã‚ˆã†è¨­å®šã‚’ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã®ã§ã€ãã®è¨˜è¿°ã‚‚å‰Šé™¤ã—ãŸã€‚

ã§ã¯ã€å¼•ãç¶šãå¾Œè€…ã®ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã®è§£æ±ºã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
[ERROR in chunk application \[entry\] js/\[name\]\-\[contenthash\]\.js Cannot use \[chunkhash\] or \[contenthash\] for chunk in \.\.\.\. \| GoRails](https://gorails.com/forum/error-in-chunk-application-entry-js-name-contenthash-js-cannot-use-chunkhash-or-contenthash-for-chunk-in)ã‚’å‚è€ƒã«ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«è¨˜è¿°ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ãŸã€‚

```js:config/webpack/development.js
process.env.NODE_ENV = process.env.NODE_ENV || 'development'

const environment = require('./environment')
const config = environment.toWebpackConfig();

config.output.filename = "js/[name]-[hash].js"
module.exports = config
```

ã“ã‚Œã§`bin/webpack-dev-server`ã¯æˆåŠŸã—ã€ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã¯ã§ããŸã‚‚ã®ã®ã€ç”»é¢ã¯çœŸã£ç™½ã€‚
ã‚³ãƒ³ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã«ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‡ºã‚‹ã€‚

[Webpack 4 ã§ Cannot assign to read only property 'exports' of object ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ \- ã‹ã‚‚ãƒ¡ãƒ¢](https://chaika.hatenablog.com/entry/2019/02/04/083000)
[Webpacker 3\.x \-> 5\.x\-> jsbundling\-rails \- Qiita](https://qiita.com/asip2k25/items/c80a50cc4b38ab492248#node_modules-%E3%82%92-babel-loader-%E3%81%AE%E5%AF%BE%E8%B1%A1%E3%81%8B%E3%82%89%E9%99%A4%E5%A4%96%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B%E3%82%AA%E3%83%97%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%B3)ã‚’å‚è€ƒã«
ã‚’å‚è€ƒã«ã€node_modulesã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¾ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ãŸã€‚

```js:config/webpack/environment.js
const { environment } = require("@rails/webpacker")
const { VueLoaderPlugin } = require("vue-loader")
const vue = require("./loaders/vue")

environment.plugins.prepend("VueLoaderPlugin", new VueLoaderPlugin())
environment.loaders.append("vue", vue)
environment.loaders.delete('nodeModules') // ã“ã®è¡Œã‚’è¿½åŠ 
module.exports = environment
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã‚ˆã†ã‚„ããƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§JSã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€ã“ã¨ãŒã§ããŸã€‚
